alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 7:27PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Thomas and southwestern Brooks Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 727 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Quitman, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quitman, Boston, Barwick, Dixie, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Grooverville, Dillon, Everett, Patten, Eason, Oaklawn, Pidcock, Empress, Brooks Co A/p and Newark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
